{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xirrus |model=XD2-230 |revision=(Model XD2230) |series=AC4000 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |fcc_date=08/15/2017 |fcc_id=SK6-XD2230 |ic_id=5428A-XD2230 |pcb_id=2976557901 |type=enterprise access point |pwr_poe=at |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7030V;OCTEON III; |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160DTTI-70G |fla2=4 GiB |fla2_brand=Kingston |fla2_model=EMMC04G-M627 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |ram1_num=2 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43460 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL (internal) |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43525 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL (internal) |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_chip1_brand=Atheros |eth_chip1_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1A; |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8033;AR8033-AL1A; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=2.4/5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Skyworks;SE5516;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Skyworks;SKY85806-11;3; ,,, Bluetooth Chip;Broadcom;BCM20704;BCM20704UA2;1; |flags=Wave2, SDR, MU-MIMO, VHT160, Bluetooth LE }}
:• '''600''' Mbps - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n 802.11n] (40MHz chan.), :• '''1300''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''2600''' Mbps - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac 802.11ac] (160MHz chan.) = '''''AC4000'' class'''
{{TagLine|Intelligent 802.11ac Wave 2 Access Point}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.cambiumnetworks.com/products/wifi/xirrus-xd2-230-wifi-access-point/}} {{•}} [https://cdn.cambiumnetworks.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/CN_data_sheet_Xirrus_XD2_Indoor_AP-2.pdf Datasheet] {{•}} [https://fccid.io/SK6-XD2230 FCC ID.io] "2976557901" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Delta Networks]] (Wi1: 2976558100, Wi2: 2976558201) The 3.9Gbps maximum Wi-Fi bandwidth claimed in the datasheet :appears to be achieved as follows. The BCM43460 radio can be configured for 2.4GHz or 5GHz operation. {{See also|Cambium Networks PMP 450m|Riverbed XH2-240|Cavium}} ===Models=== :;[[Xirrus]] • [https://www.cambiumnetworks.com/products/wifi/ X-Series Wi-Fi Access Points] *[[Xirrus XD2-230]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :indoor, 11ac, wave 2, 3x3, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus XD2-240]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :indoor, 11ac, wave 2, 4x4, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus XD4-130]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :indoor, 11ac, 3x3, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus XD4-240]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :indoor, 11ac, wave 2, 4x4, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus XA4-240]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :indoor, 11ac, wave 2, 4x4, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus XH2-240]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :outdoor, 11ac, wave 2, 4x4, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus XR-320]] - Wall Plate (Dual radio wall mount AP) :indoor, 11ac, 2x2, 4x GbE, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise *[[Xirrus X2-120]] - Wi-Fi Access Point :indoor, 11ac, 2x2, XMS-Cloud, XMS-Enterprise :;Cambium Networks Wi-Fi 6 Access Points *[[Cambium Networks XV3-8]] - Wi-Fi 6 Access Point :2.4/5GHz, indoor, Wi-Fi 6, 8x8, cnMaestro, XMS-Cloud *[[Cambium Networks XV2-2]] - Wi-Fi 6 Access Point :2.4/5GHz, indoor, Wi-Fi 6, 2x2, cnMaestro, XMS-Cloud ==Images== *[https://fccid.io/SK6-XD2230/External-Photos/External-Photos-3509919 External Photos] {{•}} [https://fccid.io/SK6-XD2230/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-1-3509920 Internal Photos-1] {{•}} [https://fccid.io/SK6-XD2230/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2-3509921 Internal Photos-2] __NOTOC__
